Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kube-vip-cloud-provider is earlier than 0.0.2-12, affected by CVE-2023-44487
